attributes.action: Daylight savings: permanently pick a time - GMT or BST
attributes.additional_details:
There is no good reason to change our clocks twice a year flipping back and forth 1 hour each time. It's outdated and ridiculous.

We need to take back control of our time.
attributes.background: Parliament should consider making GMT or BST permanent. Make a choice and stick with it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612319
